class Buffer

A buffer of data used for rendering.

Method Detail

Create

public void Create();
Creates a new buffer.

Destroy

public void Destroy();
Destroys the buffer.

LoadData

public void LoadData( void* data, DWORD size, BufferType bt );
Loads the specified data to the buffer.
Parameters:
data - Pointer to the data to be stored.
size - Size of the data in bytes.
bt - The buffer type.

LoadIndexData

public void LoadIndexData( void* data, DWORD count, BufferType bt );
Specific function to load index data.
Parameters:
data - Pointer to the indices to be stored.
count - Number of indices.
bt - The buffer type.

RenderIndexStream

public void RenderIndexStream( RenderMode mode, DWORD count );
Renders an index stream.
Parameters:
mode - The rendering mode.
count - The number of indices to render.

RenderStream

public void RenderStream( RenderMode mode, DWORD count );
Renders a stream.
Parameters:
mode - The rendering mode.
count - The number of indices to render.

SetColorStream

public void SetColorStream();
Binds the buffer as a color stream.

SetNormalStream

public void SetNormalStream();
Binds the buffer as a normal stream.

SetTexCoordStream

public void SetTexCoordStream( unsigned int unit );
Binds the buffer as a texture coordinate stream.
Parameters:
unit - Specifies the texture unit.

SetVertexStream

public void SetVertexStream( int numCoords );
Binds the buffer as a vertex stream.
Parameters:
numCoords - The number of coordinates per vertex.
